Really? Suzu?  I used to feel sorry for him too but now I feel kind of
scared of him 0_O  I think the writers have to show some real skill
and not just rely on the "you killed my teacher" excuse (which was
parodied in Kill Bill Vol. 2)...PMK, I love it I love it, but there is
sooo much of the evil twin model.  Yoshida is the evil twin for
Hijikata, Okita has an evil twin, and Susu is Tetsu's evil twin...I
know even RK  kind of has the evil twin model but in PMK it is very
very pronounced.

I saw your Maekawa residence pics...there is an actual tour you can
download at http://www.the-shinsengumi.com/ (the link is in the middle
of the sword)...and they show the floorboards the rooms etc and the
tour guides act like they are all scared etc...funny

I tried to answer your question by going to fifay.net but the address
keeps "timing out"...and as of right now it is still "timing out" but
I think fifay.net has the answer to your question
